oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Includes source codes, test cases, and example data used in the thesis Brittle Fracture Simulation with Boundary Elements for Computer Graphics. Also includes pre-built binaries of the HyENA library, but not sources - please contact the HyENA authors to obtain these sources if required (https://mech.tugraz.at/hyena)
